name: withServerValue
signature: { <A extends Atom<any>>(read: (get: <A>(atom: Atom<A>) => A) => Type<A>): (self: A) => A; <A extends Atom<any>>(self: A, read: (get: <A>(atom: Atom<A>) => A) => Type<A>): A; }
description: Overrides the value of an Atom when read on the server.
